amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS \ SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the amendments made to sections 740.12 of title 15, Code of Federal Regulations (relating to license exemptions for gift parcels and humanitarian donations for Cuba), and 740.14 of such title (relating to license exemptions for baggage taken by individuals for travel to Cuba), as published in the Federal Register on June 22, 2004 (69 Fed. Reg. 34565-34567).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement the Commerce Department's new restrictions on gift parcels to Cuba and the amount of personal baggage allowed for travellers to Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 194 (Roll no. 329).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
